events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position, and our team will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department for the role of software developer, matching your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the subsequent hiring stages.
You participated in the initial screening call to assess your basic technical knowledge and fit for the software engineering role.
You responded promptly confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 3 PM UTC, focusing on coding challenges and system design.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and sound knowledge of software engineering principles.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 18th at 11 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit and employment terms.
The HR interview went well, covering your expectations and alignment with company values and policies.
We have extended a formal job offer for the software engineering position, including salary details and benefits.
You provided feedback expressing your delight with the offer and readiness to move forward with the hiring process.
You have formally accepted the job offer, confirming your start date and enthusiasm for joining the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has commenced with orientation sessions and initial training tailored for software engineers.
The recruitment process has been successfully completed, and you are now officially part of the engineering department.
